name: Covert Courier
description:
I highly recommend playing with a gamepad in the downloaded version!

This was tested with an older gamepad, so you might have to set the axises yourself in the Unity launcher! Also, please play in windowed mode! ALSO, fair warning: The UI won't appear if the window is too small!

IN-GAME ACTIONS:

  • "Action" tosses letters
  • Hold "Action" for a second and release to toss a parcel!
  • Down & "Action" uses your special move.
  • Hit "Pause" to bring up the pause menu, then Click abilities to equip.
  • Press pause again to escape the pause menu.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to Move/Aim
  • Space to Fire
  • Right Shift to Jump
  • Escape to Pause

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

  • Move Left Stick to Move
  • Gently tilt Left Stick to Aim without moving
  • "Action" to Fire
  • "Jump" to Jump
  • "Pause" to Pause

Made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 32! (Ludum Dare Jam 32?)

Art by @IMPLODINGORACLE!
